component

Class Component

  • java.lang.Object
    • component.Component
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Assets.BreakIndicator, Assets.GameBackground, Assets.LightAnimation, Assets.LoadingBackground, Assets.LoadingText, Assets.MenuBackground, ClickableComponent, Tile

    public abstract class Component
extends java.lang.Object
    A class representing a visual component of the game.
    Author:
    Spencer Yoder
